short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily find cards within the Malleus Clinical Medicine Deck that are related to the currently open webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to easily find cards in the Malleus Clinical Medicine Anki deck that are related to the webpage you are currently viewing. Currently supports eMedici, eTG complete, AMH online, RCH and much more.

Please read more about the project here:
https://malleuscm.notion.site

You will also need to download the anki-connect extension (https://ankiweb.net/shared/info/2055492159)

The github repository for this extension is available here: https://github.com/Sabicool/Malleus-Extension
